name: Darker dark gmail
additional_info:
Work in progress.
It requires you set Gmail's dark theme as default.

Sorry if the screenshots are not very impressive, I deleted all items for privacy. Maybe I'll screenshot some fake emails. Try the style to get an idea!

Fork the repo and contribute!

Github: https://github.com/seguri/darker-dark-gmail

2017-09-11
* Improve "click here to reply" box

2017-05-10
* Improve contacts page

2017-03-16
* Improve background color of email list items
* Improve "reply all"
* Improve emails with calendars

2017-03-03
* Bugfixes

2017-03-02
* Add github repo
* Improve "Compose" button
* Improve "Search" button
* Improve loading screen

2017-02-16
* Support more elements
* Switch to SASS. The CSS code here is the exported output

2017-02-15
* Start project. Invert some colors
